column5: I heard that there is an indoor dog park in Bowmanville, but can't seem to find any info on it.  Does anyone know if this is true, and where I can get some info on it. My pup is getting old enough (and vaccinated) so I'd like to get her out and about socalizing with other dogs.  Any info is greatly appreciated.   *Stoty
indoor dog park.... in bowmanville? maybe something new.... i moved away just a couple years ago.... the newest thing i knew of was indoor soccer thing..... and a school... lol.
Home depot is there, and Wal-mart is 1/2 built!
I'm not sure if this one is indoor but a few friends take there pooches for daycare and say all good things about it.      http://www.superdogcentral.ca/  Hope this helps

saaaweeeeet! they finally got those built eh? i was hopin they'd get them done while i was down there... but that obviously didnt happen, haha! good stuff.  mostly hopin for them to be done cause i lived pretty much right across the street!!!
Thanks for the link Moose. I'm not sure if that's the same one, but I'll check that out for sure!
This place in Ajx has an indoor park with lots of fun stuff for dogs to do.  http://www.whoswalkingwho.net/index.html  Dirk
